gurmukhi: ਜਾਤਿ ਸਿਹਿਜਾਸਨ ਜੳੁ ਕਾਮਨੀ ਜਾਮਨੀ ਸਮੈ ਗੁਰਜਨ ਸੁਜਨ ਕੀ ਬਾਤ ਨ ਸੁਹਾਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaati Sihijaasan Jau Kaamanee Jaamanee Samai , Gurjan Sujan Kee Baat N Suhaat Hai ?
translation: When a wife proceeds to enjoy the union of her husband in his bed at night, no talk of any noble, elderly or holy person appeals to her.

gurmukhi: ਹਿਮ ਕਰਿ ੳੁਦਿਤ ਮੁਦਤਿ ਹੈ ਚਕੋਰ ਚਿਤਿ ੲਿਕ ਟਕ ਧਿਅਾਨ ਕੈ ਸਮਾਰਤ ਨ ਗਾਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Him Kari Udit Mudati Hai Chakor Chiti , Ik Tak Dhiaan Kai Samaarat N Gaat Hai ?
translation: As the moon rises, the ruddy sheldrake is immensely pleased and gazing at it with concentration of mind, is unaware of his own body even.

gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਮਧੁਕਰ ਮਕਰੰਦ ਰਸ ਲੁਭਤ ਹੈ ਬਿਸਮ ਕਮਲ ਦਲ ਸੰਪਟ ਸਮਾਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Madhoukar Makarand Ras Loubhat Hai , Bisam Kamal Dal Sanpat Samaat Hai ?
translation: Just as a bumble bee is so engrossed in the sweet smelling nectar of the flower, that it gets trapped in the box-like lotus flower when the Sun sets.

gurmukhi: ਤੈਸੇ ਗੁਰ ਚਰਨ ਸਰਨਿ ਚਲਿ ਜਾਤਿ ਸਿਖ ਦਰਸ ਪਰਸ ਪ੍ਰੇਮ ਰਸ ਮੁਸਕਾਤਿ ਹੈ ||੪੩੩||
transliteration: Taisay Gur Charan Sarani Chali Jaati Sikha , Daras Paras Praym Ras Mousakaati Hai ?433?
translation: Similarly a devoted slave disciple goes to the refuge of the holy feet of the True Guru; enjoying His sight and entranced in His love, he keeps smiling within while relishing the divine spectacle.  (433)
